content: Determine the median of the heights of these 7 people, in centimeters: 162, 174, 176, 178, 182, 185, 190.

To determine the median of a set of numbers, you need to arrange the numbers in order and find the middle value. The heights you provided are already in ascending order: 162, 174, 176, 178, 182, 185, 190.

Since there are 7 values, the median will be the fourth value in this ordered list. Therefore, the median height is 178 centimeters.
